    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        public Genome optimize(int iteration,
                       java.lang.String nom_fichier,
                       int part,
                       boolean dijkstra,
                       double target,
                       int nb_param)
                throws exceptions.NeuroneException
        Launch the algorithm for specified number of iteration. Saves best of each gen in a file nom_fichier + generation number. Takes the best population/part for parenting next gen ie if part = 2 the best half is kept to parent next gen, if part = 4 we take the best quarter...
        Parameters:
        iteration -
        nom_fichier -
        part -
        dijkstra - true if you want to use a RadarDijsktra, false otherwise
        target - sets a goal for the simulation to stop if reached
        nb_param - number of additional input in the first layer (ie speed, maxTurn etc...). Make sure you changed StrategyPerceptron accordingly
        Returns:
        Throws:
        exceptions.NeuroneException
